content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Glorification\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Epic Anniversary\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We build trustful and long-term relationships with all team members and are so happy to celebrate \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"every anniversary\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" for account colleagues. So, we will be glad to assign those badges to you soon. specific occasions, we've designed an \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPG Champion Badge \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to highlight achievements and accomplishments.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":14032,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ac7f0a2e-d59e-4ee0-8af3-742c586bf65c/epic10.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ac7f0a2e-d59e-4ee0-8af3-742c586bf65c/epic10.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"epic10.JPG\",\"name\":\"epic10.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ac7f0a2e-d59e-4ee0-8af3-742c586bf65c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":279,\"height\":213},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The “\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Epic Involved\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"” badge is a great way to show your commitment to being an engaged and active member of our Account. It can be earned by attending events, asking thoughtful questions during presentations, participating in discussions, and contributing to the success of our Town Halls.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We believe that recognizing and rewarding participation is an important part of fostering a culture of engagement and collaboration. With the “\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Epic Involved\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"” badge, you can demonstrate your dedication to our organization and show others that you are committed to making a difference.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"So, whether you are a seasoned veteran or a new member of our team, we encourage you to participate in our events and earn your “\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Epic Involved\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"” badge. And don't forget, you can also give this badge to your colleagues as a way to acknowledge their active contributions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":86997,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1a1193c1-cdcf-42b8-bfb4-b99d9a89a5d3/MicrosoftTeams-image (51).png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1a1193c1-cdcf-42b8-bfb4-b99d9a89a5d3/MicrosoftTeams-image (51).png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"MicrosoftTeams-image (51).png\",\"name\":\"MicrosoftTeams-image (51).png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1a1193c1-cdcf-42b8-bfb4-b99d9a89a5d3\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":165,\"height\":165},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
